name: Colour Culler Prototype Game
description:
The Colour Culler prototype is a simple shooter that takes place on a mini-planet. The aim is to shoot and destroy the red enemies to protect the green NPCs. 

The game uses physics to move the character around and to make gravity.  This aspect took a while to make, after research online and various YouTube tutorials. 

Game Controls

  • Use WASD to move the player
  • Use the MOUSE to control the camera
  • Press the LEFT MOUSE button to shoot

Software Used

  • Unreal Engine 4.27.0
  • Adobe Photoshop 2022
